1_executive_summary.purpose: Document two utility files in coderef-docs/coderef/ directory: timestamp.py (7.3K) for generating RSMS v2.0 and UDS-compliant timestamps with functions get_date(), get_timestamp(), get_iso_timestamp(); and remove-emojis.py (6.2K) CLI tool for stripping emojis from markdown/text files with dry-run, recursive processing, and custom pattern support
1_executive_summary.value_proposition: Provide comprehensive documentation for these utility functions to improve discoverability and ease of use for developers working with the coderef-docs system
1_executive_summary.real_world_analogy: Similar to building no-emoji-and-timestamp - systematically implementing each requirement to deliver complete functionality
1_executive_summary.use_case: User requests no-emoji-and-timestamp → System implements: Document timestamp.py functions with parameter descriptions and return values, Document remove-emojis.py CLI arguments and usage examples, Explain RSMS v2.0 and UDS timestamp format compliance → Feature is functional
1_executive_summary.output: Implemented 5 requirements: Document timestamp.py functions with parameter descriptions and return values, Document remove-emojis.py CLI arguments and usage examples, Explain RSMS v2.0 and UDS timestamp format compliance

edge_case_scenarios.setup: Call function with None or empty string
